books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: After a raid on a brothel that serviced Chicago’s elite, two people are dead and the madam’s black book has disappeared. Who is responsible?
books.name: THE BLACK BOOK

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: A high school baseball coach hiding his real identity poses a threat to an idyllic suburban community.
books.name: ONE PERFECT LIE

books.author: by Jeffery Deaver
books.description: Lincoln Rhyme travels to Italy to investigate a case.
books.name: THE BURIAL HOUR

books.author: by Timothy Zahn
books.description: The origins of Grand Admiral Thrawn, an iconic “Star Wars” villain.
books.name: THRAWN: ALLIANCES

books.author: by William P. Young
books.description: A man whose daughter was abducted is invited to an isolated shack, apparently by God.
books.name: THE SHACK

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: On a luxury cruise ship, a wealthy aristocrat is found murdered, and her emerald necklace has disappeared.
books.name: ALL BY MYSELF, ALONE

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Vi Keeland and Penelope Ward
books.description: A reporter is torn between a cocky businessman and his assumed identity as a bike messenger.
books.name: MISTER MONEYBAGS

books.author: by Anne Hillerman
books.description: The third Southwestern mystery featuring the Navajo police officer Bernadette Manuelito and her husband, Jim Chee.
books.name: SONG OF THE LION

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Martha Hall Kelly
books.description: A story of three women’s lives during and after World War II.
books.name: LILAC GIRLS

books.author: by W. Bruce Cameron
books.description: A canine narrator undergoes a series of reincarnations.
books.name: A DOG'S PURPOSE
